name: Epic Battle Fantasy 5
description: A turn-based RPG adventure, full of video game references, juvenile dialogue, and anime fanservice... and also strategic combat, monster catching, and tons of treasure hunting!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.3 GHz Dual Core (or better for higher settings) Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Doesn't matter much Storage: 300 MB available space Additional Notes: Game can be played with mouse only
